contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1933 D South Shields Contest
South Shields Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
south-shields-contest
None
Cricket Field, South Shields, County Durham Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £3, 4th £1.1s. worth of music. March contest - 1st £1 Craghead Colliery, 2nd Backworth Colliery. Best trombone section - Craghead. Best cornet and euphonium - Silksworth. 4 bands competed
Oct. 23, 2013, 10:56 a.m. April 20, 2018, 11:24 a.m.
1 Reg Vardy Band Unknown Maesgarmon
2 Pride Valley Brass Unknown La Traviata [arr. Godfrey]
3 Coxlodge Institute Band Unknown
4 Backworth Colliery Band Unknown Gems of Melody
